name: playwright-ts-automation
description: Playwright TypeScript + Cucumber automation framework for UI, API, and Accessibility testing

scripts.test:ui: npm run clean && cucumber-js --tags '@ui' && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:api: npm run clean && cucumber-js --tags '@api' && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:accessibility: npm run clean && cucumber-js --tags '@accessibility' && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:dev: npm run clean && ENV=dev cucumber-js && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:qa: npm run clean && ENV=qa cucumber-js && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:ui:dev: npm run clean && ENV=dev cucumber-js --tags '@ui' && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:ui:qa: npm run clean && ENV=qa cucumber-js --tags '@ui' && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:api:dev: npm run clean && ENV=dev cucumber-js --tags '@api' && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:api:qa: npm run clean && ENV=qa cucumber-js --tags '@api' && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:accessibility:dev: npm run clean && ENV=dev cucumber-js --tags '@accessibility' && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:accessibility:qa: npm run clean && ENV=qa cucumber-js --tags '@accessibility' && npm run allure:generate
